# minFocusRectOfInterestSize

**Instance Property**

The minimum size you may use when specifying a rectangle of interest.

## Declaration

```swift
var minFocusRectOfInterestSize: CGSize { get }
```

## Discussion

The size returned is in normalized coordinates, and depends on the current [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/activeFormat]. If [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/isFocusRectOfInterestSupported] returns `false`, this property returns { 0, 0 }.

## Setting a focus rectangle of interest

- **isFocusRectOfInterestSupported**: Whether the receiver supports focus rectangles of interest.
- **focusRectOfInterest**: The device’s current focus rectangle of interest, if it has one.
- **defaultRectForFocusPoint(ofInterest:)**: The default rectangle of interest used for a given focus point of interest.
